name: part_011
file: tmp_Airani iofifteen Birthday 2025 3D Live, Have a Nice Trip and Dream #iofiLucidDream [mMDPWutdkDM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: MC section: Airani Iofifteen announces a special segment before the end of her birthday celebration.
Merch Showcase: Airani Iofifteen introduces her 2025 birthday merchandise set.
Final MC: Iofifteen talks about her membership stream and prepares for the final song.
Final performance: Airani Iofifteen performs the song 'Kokoro no Sakamichi' with sign language.

subtitles.original: Benar, terima kasih semuanya.
subtitles.english: That's right, thank you everyone.

subtitles.original: Iya, akhirnya ya, Iofi's Birthday Celebration 2025 sudah di penghujung acara.
subtitles.english: Yes, finally, Iofi's Birthday Celebration 2025 is at the end of the show.

subtitles.original: Tapi jangan skip-skip dulu!
subtitles.english: But don't skip yet!

subtitles.original: Sebelum berakhir, aku punya sesuatu untuk kalian.
subtitles.english: Before it ends, I have something for you.

subtitles.original: でわ、Birthday Goods... たったーん! ぶっぶん!
subtitles.english: Now, Birthday Goods... tadaaa! Bam!

subtitles.original: Hai, Iofi's Birthday 2025.
subtitles.english: Hi, Iofi's Birthday 2025.

subtitles.original: Kita punya 3 merch dan sesuatu yang spesial dan voice.
subtitles.english: We have 3 merch items, something special, and a voice pack.

subtitles.original: Mari kita lihat ya, とんたん!
subtitles.english: Let's take a look, ta-da!

subtitles.original: Hai, ioDreaming Blanket. I'll keep you warm 24/7.
subtitles.english: Hi, ioDreaming Blanket. I'll keep you warm 24/7.

subtitles.original: イオフィが暖かく包んであげるよ。
subtitles.english: Iofi will wrap you up warmly.

subtitles.original: こうやって、ぎゅっとね。温かいからね。
subtitles.english: Like this, a big hug. Because it's warm.

subtitles.original: Jadi kalau kalian aduh dingin, perlu ditemani hangat ini,
subtitles.english: So if you're cold and need some warm company,

subtitles.original: aku akan menemani malam-malammu yang dingin.
subtitles.english: I will accompany you through your cold nights.

subtitles.original: で、今年もイラストは夜ノみつきママ! ありがとう!
subtitles.english: And this year's illustration is by Mitsuki Mama again! Thank you!

subtitles.original: 皆様もママありがとう! わー!
subtitles.english: Everyone's mama, thank you! Wow!

subtitles.original: Lucu sekali, ふわふわ、かわいい。
subtitles.english: It's so cute, fluffy, and cute.

subtitles.original: Et tapi kalau sudah ada blanket berarti kurang apa sih?
subtitles.english: But if you have a blanket, what else is missing?

subtitles.original: Ah, next up!
subtitles.english: Ah, next up!

subtitles.original: We have this one! Sweet Dreams Pillow Cover.
subtitles.english: We have this one! Sweet Dreams Pillow Cover.

subtitles.original: Iya, ah...
subtitles.english: Yes, ah...

subtitles.original: Jadi ini selain...
subtitles.english: So this is besides...

subtitles.original: tapi kayaknya kepala kalian bisa pas buat di... ehehe.
subtitles.english: but it seems like your heads would fit perfectly in... hehe.

subtitles.original: Basically, it's so fluffy, it's so comfy.
subtitles.english: Basically, it's so fluffy, it's so comfy.

subtitles.original: You can place your head right in... yeah, ehehe.
subtitles.english: You can place your head right in... yeah, ehehe.

subtitles.original: あの、これいいでしょ、こうやって。
subtitles.english: Um, this is good, right? Like this.

subtitles.original: は、そうそう。
subtitles.english: Ha, yeah, yeah.

subtitles.original: あ、でもでもでも、イオフィに夢中すぎてちょっと時間忘れちゃう。
subtitles.english: Oh, but, but, but, if you get too absorbed in Iofi that you forget the time.

subtitles.original: あ、やばいどうしようっていうときはこちらです!
subtitles.english: Ah no, what should I do? In that case, here it is!

subtitles.original: Hai! Jadi kalian kalau punya ini nggak akan lupa waktu.
subtitles.english: Hi! So if you have this, you won't forget the time.

subtitles.original: Aduh aku terlalu fokus sama Iofi, aku lupa waktu, oh my God!
subtitles.english: "Oh, I'm too focused on Iofi, I forgot the time, oh my God!"

subtitles.original: Ini!
subtitles.english: This!

subtitles.original: So you won't really forget about time while thinking about me.
subtitles.english: So you won't really forget about time while thinking about me.

subtitles.original: あははは! かわいいでしょ?
subtitles.english: Ahahaha! Isn't it cute?

subtitles.original: はい! あ、でもでもでも、次次次次、次は...
subtitles.english: Yes! Ah but but but, next, next, next, next...

subtitles.original: なんだなんだ? あ、こちらです!
subtitles.english: what is it? Ah, here it is!

subtitles.original: はい、どうぞ!
subtitles.english: Yes, please!

subtitles.original: Gini kita bisa ketemu di dalam mimpi.
subtitles.english: This way we can meet in a dream.

subtitles.original: Situational Voice Pack "Dream Rendezvous" so you will be meeting me in a dream.
subtitles.english: Situational Voice Pack "Dream Rendezvous" so you will be meeting me in a dream.

subtitles.original: そう夢でも会えるように、このボイスを聴いてね!
subtitles.english: So so that we can meet even in dreams, please listen to this voice pack!

subtitles.original: はい!
subtitles.english: Yes!

subtitles.original: では、あの... 日本語、インドネシア語と英語、三つです!
subtitles.english: Now, um... Japanese, Indonesian, and English, there are three!

subtitles.original: はい、みんな聴いてね!
subtitles.english: Yes, everyone please listen!

subtitles.original: ででで、今年が新しいのよ、私の出てくるのよ。
subtitles.english: And, and, and, this year there's something new, I'm coming out.

subtitles.original: There's gonna be something new this year and this is it! Pam!
subtitles.english: There's gonna be something new this year and this is it! Bam!

subtitles.original: If you buy the full version, there's gonna be hololive OFFICIAL CARD GAME PR card!
subtitles.english: If you buy the full version, there's gonna be hololive OFFICIAL CARD GAME PR card!

subtitles.original: Yeay! This is a bonus hololive card.
subtitles.english: Yeay! This is a bonus hololive card.

subtitles.original: Ini sebagai bonus pemberian full set premium, premium merchandise.
subtitles.english: This is a bonus for the premium full set purchase, premium merchandise.

subtitles.original: Akan tambahan bonus kartu yang bisa kalian pakai di gamenya official hololive card, yes!
subtitles.english: There's an additional bonus card that you can use in the hololive Official Card Game, yes!

subtitles.original: You can actually use it on the game, yeah.
subtitles.english: You can actually use it on the game, yeah.

subtitles.original: これでさ、大会とかで使ったらさ、めっちゃ自慢できますよ。
subtitles.english: With this, if you use it in tournaments or something, you can really brag.

subtitles.original: こうやって、 「うわ、これがイオフィの限定の誕生日グッズから出たんや。」
subtitles.english: Like this, "Whoa, this came from Iofi's limited birthday goods."

subtitles.original: ほい!
subtitles.english: Hey!

subtitles.original: でもまあお守りとしてもね、ここに置いてても大丈夫ですよ。
subtitles.english: But well, even as a lucky charm, it's okay to keep it here.

subtitles.original: イオフィはここにいるから。
subtitles.english: Because Iofi is right here.

subtitles.original: えへへへ!
subtitles.english: Ehehehe!

subtitles.original: Yeah!
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: Jadi ini bonus bisa dipakai di kartu ya di gamenya official hololive card
subtitles.english: So this bonus card can be used in the Hololive Official Card Game,

subtitles.original: tapi kartunya hari ini yang ini sayang sekali baru ada bahasa Jepangnya jadi mohon pengertiannya ya.
subtitles.english: but unfortunately, this one is only available in Japanese for now, so please understand.

subtitles.original: Untuk detail kartu dan cara bermain bisa dicek di homepage.
subtitles.english: For card details and how to play, you can check the homepage.

subtitles.original: Begitu guys, terima kasih!
subtitles.english: That's it guys, thank you!

subtitles.original: Dan kita sudah sampai di penghujung-ujung-ujung-ujung acara.
subtitles.english: And we've reached the very, very, very end of the show.

subtitles.original: Mmm, jadi karena tahun lalu kita sudah dengar "Here I Am" yang biasa...
subtitles.english: Mmm, since last year we heard the regular "Here I Am"...

subtitles.original: nah tahun ini aku punya yang spesial untuk kalian.
subtitles.english: well, this year I have something special for you.

subtitles.original: "Here I Am" full bahasa Indonesia!
subtitles.english: "Here I Am" full in Indonesian!

subtitles.original: Hai! "Here I Am" Indonesian version.
subtitles.english: Yes! "Here I Am" Indonesian version.

subtitles.original: Tapi itu hanya untuk membership.
subtitles.english: But that's only for membership.

subtitles.original: や、メンバーシップ限定で "Here I Am" インドネシア語バージョン後で歌います。
subtitles.english: Yes, I'll sing the Indonesian version of "Here I Am" later in a membership-only stream.

subtitles.original: Hai!
subtitles.english: Yes!

subtitles.original: Jadi habis ini akan apa ya?
subtitles.english: So after this, what's next?

subtitles.original: Aku akan ketemu kalian di membership, oke?
subtitles.english: I'll see you guys in membership, okay?

subtitles.original: でわ、本当の本当の本当の最後の曲になります。 はい!
subtitles.english: Now, it's time for the truly, truly, truly last song. Yes!

subtitles.original: This will be my last song for tonight.
subtitles.english: This will be my last song for tonight.

subtitles.original: I hope you're ready.
subtitles.english: I hope you're ready.

subtitles.original: This last song will be...
subtitles.english: This last song will be...

subtitles.original: 心の坂道
subtitles.english: Heart's Sloped Path

subtitles.original: 手話で。
subtitles.english: In sign language.

subtitles.original: 何度も苦しい思いをした
subtitles.english: I've been through pain more times than I can say

subtitles.original: 何度も悲しい思いもした
subtitles.english: I've felt the sorrow that wouldn't go away

subtitles.original: 今日までたくさん歩いてきた
subtitles.english: Step by step, I've made it here today

subtitles.original: 心の坂道を (坂道を)
subtitles.english: Up the hill where my feelings lay (Up the hill)

subtitles.original: 歩き慣れた帰り道
subtitles.english: I tripped and fell on the road I always take

subtitles.original: のぞせむ転んだ
subtitles.english: Caught off guard,

subtitles.original: 不意打ちみたいで
subtitles.english: like a sudden break

subtitles.original: まるで裏切られた気分
subtitles.english: It hit me like a stab in the back
